title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.14 - Hearing upon application for new license or reinstatement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.14 - Hearing upon application for new license or reinstatement

State Regulations

Any person, firm, corporation or organization licensed
pursuant to the Bingo Control Law or the Bingo Licensing Law that has had its
license or identification number revoked shall appear at a hearing before
whichever authority revoked the license at the time of making application for a
new license or identification number, or for reinstatement of either or
both. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4830.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
